DTwrapers 0.0.1
  • Reference

dt.filter

dt.filter.Rd

A fucntion that subsets the data corresponding to the filtering statement.

dt.filter(dat, the.filter = NULL)

Arguments

dat

a data.frame
the.filter

a character value or expression stating the logical operations to be performed.

Examples

region.name = "Region"
gender.name = "Gender"
product.name = "Product"
income.name = "Income"
age.name = "Age"
persona.name = "Persona"

dt.filter(dat = formulaic::snack.dat,
         the.filter = "Region == 'Northeast' & Gender == 'Female' & Age >= 80 & Income > 145000 & 
         Product == 'Cookie_Crumble'")
#>    Age Gender Income    Region            Persona        Product Awareness
#> 1:  86 Female 146000 Northeast  Millenial Muncher Cookie_Crumble         1
#> 2:  85 Female 147000 Northeast  Millenial Muncher Cookie_Crumble         1
#> 3:  87 Female 148000 Northeast Mainstream Maynard Cookie_Crumble         0
#>    BP_For_Me_0_10 BP_Fits_Budget_0_10 BP_Tastes_Great_0_10
#> 1:              5                   4                    0
#> 2:              4                   5                    3
#> 3:             NA                  NA                   NA
#>    BP_Good_To_Share_0_10 BP_Like_Logo_0_10 BP_Special_Occasions_0_10
#> 1:                     0                 1                         1
#> 2:                     2                 4                         3
#> 3:                    NA                NA                        NA
#>    BP_Everyday_Snack_0_10 BP_Healthy_0_10 BP_Delicious_0_10
#> 1:                      4               0                 2
#> 2:                      3               0                 8
#> 3:                     NA              NA                NA
#>    BP_Right_Amount_0_10 BP_Relaxing_0_10 Consideration Consumption Satisfaction
#> 1:                    0                2             1           1            6
#> 2:                    3                2             0          NA           NA
#> 3:                   NA               NA            NA          NA           NA
#>    Advocacy Age Group    Income Group User ID
#> 1:        0 [ 65,120] [100000,150000)  id_113
#> 2:       NA [ 65,120] [100000,150000)  id_353
#> 3:       NA [ 65,120] [100000,150000)  id_591
dt.filter(dat = formulaic::snack.dat,
         the.filter = "get(region.name) == 'Northeast' & get(gender.name) == 'Female' & 
         get(age.name) >= 80 & get(income.name) > 145000 & get(product.name) == 'Cookie_Crumble'")
#> Error in .checkTypos(e, names_x): Object 'region.name' not found amongst Age, Gender, Income, Region, Persona and 20 more
dt.filter(
 dat = formulaic::snack.dat,
 the.filter = expression(
   get(age.name) < 35 &
     get(persona.name) == "Millenial Muncher" &
     get(product.name) == "Tiramisoup" & get(income.name) <= 25000
 )
)
#> Error in .checkTypos(e, names_x): Object 'age.name' not found amongst Age, Gender, Income, Region, Persona and 20 more
